name: The Men From The Town Below
name_original: The Men From The Town Below
description:
This is a game partial that i have been working on with GDevelop.  It has bugs and no enemies.  https://malibudarby.itch.io/ made most of the tiles and characters for this game. 

I'm open to any recommendations or artwork you want to see in the game.  I don't really have a story line just kinda building 

I hope you enjoy and ill be updating when more is complete.   

It is a retro horror game , the player moves with the arrow keys, Q is shoot and E is how you interact with the environment. 

The green E is an interactive button they are around the map
